fields.Title: INVENTORY / NOTE FROM THE FRIDGE
fields.Description: Read the note you found from the giant ice bear fridge in the doomed commercial area.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Does it say anything interesting?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Does it say anything interesting?" The lieutenant leans closer to read the crumpled note over your shoulder.

fields.Title: A Note from the Fridge: "Didn't you see one right next to th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Didn't you see one right next to the breaker box?

fields.Title: You: ""Guess we'll never know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Guess we'll never know."

fields.Title: Logic: "It does, but who might that be?"
fields.Dialogue Text: It does, but who might that be?

fields.Title: Logic: "You're welcome."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're welcome.

fields.Title: A Note from the Fridge: "Someone has scribbled: "S, I can't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone has scribbled: "S, I can't believe the off-site copy is still here! The illiterate ginger kid keeps stealing stuff from the studio, so I had to hide it somewhere safe."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Some local miscreant probably. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some local miscreant probably. There are tons of them running around in Martinaise, ready to stir up trouble. We usually dispatch our junior officers to deal with them."

fields.Title: You: ""You mean Cuno?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean Cuno?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like someone from that radio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like someone from that radiogame company upstairs. I'm a little surprised they just left their property lying here."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's implausible.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's implausible."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's a plausible hypothesis.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a plausible hypothesis."

fields.Title: You: "[Put the note away.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Put the note away.]

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It's part of a radiocomputer. When..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's part of a radiocomputer. When not in use, filaments are stored at temperatures below zero.

fields.Title: A Note from the Fridge: "The note is written with a blue pen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The note is written with a blue pencil on a piece of lined office paper. The kitchen magnets have left spots on its surface.

fields.Title: Volition: "The damage is truly extraordinary...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The damage is truly extraordinary. It's a miracle you don't shit yourself.

fields.Title: A Note from the Fridge: "According to the note, someone name..."
fields.Dialogue Text: According to the note, someone named 'Sulis≈Çaw'.

fields.Title: You: "What's a filament memory?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's a filament memory?
fields.Alternate1: "Remind me again -- what's a filament memory?"

fields.Title: Volition: "Really? You sure it isn't a certain..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Really? You sure it isn't a certain redhaired little gremlin who refers to himself in the third person?

fields.Title: Logic: "Someone who owns a radiocomputer, o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone who owns a radiocomputer, one might assume.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "It's like the *production schedule*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's like the *production schedule* you found, only this one's an *off-site copy*.

fields.Title: You: "Read the note."
fields.Dialogue Text: Read the note.

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe they had to leave in a hurry.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe they had to leave in a hurry."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "It would be *oh so* fun to try that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It would be *oh so* fun to try that radiocomputer out for yourself.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "This is tangential at best, but the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is tangential at best, but the lieutenant's *detective instinct* is still active.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really?" The lieutenant looks at y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really?" The lieutenant looks at you, the corner of his mouth curved into a smug grin. "You don't have a single guess?"

fields.Title: Volition: "Are you serious? You sure you don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Are you serious? You sure you don't want to hazard a guess here, detective?

fields.Title: You: "Thanks, smart ass."
fields.Dialogue Text: Thanks, smart ass.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Which is to say -- not very good."
fields.Dialogue Text: Which is to say -- not very good.

fields.Title: A Note from the Fridge: "Someone has scribbled: "S, I can't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone has scribbled: "S, I can't believe the off-site copy is still here! The illiterate ginger kid keeps stealing stuff from the studio, so I had to hide it somewhere safe."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Someone who owns a radiocomputer?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Someone who owns a radiocomputer? My guess is as good as yours, officer."

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe it's because of the Entity.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe it's because of the Entity."

fields.Title: You: "That makes sense."
fields.Dialogue Text: That makes sense.

fields.Title: You: "Where's the frozen ice cream maker?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Where's the frozen ice cream maker?
fields.Alternate1: "Do you have any idea where the frozen ice cream maker could be?"

fields.Title: A Note from the Fridge: "Somewhere among the shadows in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somewhere among the shadows in the cellar.

fields.Title: You: "Nope. Drawing a blank here."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nope. Drawing a blank here.

fields.Title: Logic: "And you *did* unplug the black wire..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And you *did* unplug the black wire from said breaker box.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It belongs inside a radiocomputer,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It belongs inside a radiocomputer, storing its memory. It's like a tape -- you listen to disco tapes, right? It's like one of your disco tapes, only for a computer."

fields.Title: You: ""No, no idea at all.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no idea at all."

fields.Title: You: "Who wrote that note?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who wrote that note?
fields.Alternate2: "Someone has moved the filament! But who?"

fields.Title: A Note from the Fridge: "The note doesn't specify."
fields.Dialogue Text: The note doesn't specify.

fields.Title: A Note from the Fridge: "The note does not specify."
fields.Dialogue Text: The note does not specify.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sulis≈Çaw... wasn't he one of Miss..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sulis≈Çaw... wasn't he one of Miss Luukanen-Kilde's coworkers?" He tilts his head. "I remember coming across this name when we were reading her personal log."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Wasn't he one of Soona's former cow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wasn't he one of Soona's former coworkers?

fields.Title: You: "Who's the illiterate ginger kid?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who's the illiterate ginger kid?

fields.Title: A Note from the Fridge: ""You'll find the filament memory wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You'll find the filament memory with the off-site copy in the frozen ice cream maker. Please take it home ASAP, it's important. I'd do it myself if I lived in a civilized place with a freezer. Take care, Sulis≈Çaw."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: You: "But why did they leave a filament l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But why did they leave a filament lying in a freezer?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know... I assume it's some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know... I assume it's somewhere close to the ice bear fridge."

fields.Title: A Note from the Fridge: "Didn't you see a *melting* ice crea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Didn't you see a *melting* ice cream maker right next to the breaker box?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, I'm sure that child would *lov..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, I'm sure that child would *love* to get his hands on a filament memory -- even if he doesn't know what to do with it. He'd probably try to pawn it for speed, based on our encounter."

fields.Title: You: "Oh, you mean Cuno?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, you mean Cuno?

fields.Title: You: "Makes sense."
fields.Dialogue Text: Makes sense.

fields.Title: A Note from the Fridge: ""You'll find the filament memory wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You'll find the filament memory with the off-site copy in the frozen ice cream maker. Please take it home ASAP, it's important. I'd do it myself if I lived in a civilized place with a freezer. Take care, Sulis≈Çaw."

fields.Title: You: "Are you talking about Cuno?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Are you talking about Cuno?

fields.Title: Volition: "Ding, ding, ding! We have a winner!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Ding, ding, ding! We have a winner!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm placing my bets on a certain r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm placing my bets on a certain red-haired miscreant we met before. He'd probably try to pawn it for speed, based on our encounter."

fields.Title: You: "No idea."
fields.Dialogue Text: No idea.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Perhaps someone who belonged to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Perhaps someone who belonged to the defunct radiocomputer company?

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Sounds like a question for a detect..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sounds like a question for a detective, detective.
